subtitles:
56814 60234 People once believed that
when someone dies...

60313 64613 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

64694 68034 But sometimes, something
so bad happens...

68114 73364 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

73454 76494 Then sometimes,
just sometimes...

76584 81584 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.
127255 131265 There's a piece of glass.

135846 140356 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

140436 143685 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

147275 151236 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.
151325 153575 All right, guys, let's do it.

153656 156866 Devil's fucking Night.
What's the count so far?

158376 161206 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

161296 166176 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

169136 172467 You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

172556 177347 There are procedures. You should
have cleared this with me first.

177436 179726 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

179767 182647 - We found her, and you missed it.
- I don't care what her name is.

182726 185316 I didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

185397 188856 I can see why they took
away your gold shield.

188947 191947 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.
192026 193947 All right, clear out.

195327 197917 - Shelly?
- Stand back, kid.

200167 204377 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.
204457 206667 Tell him to take care of Sarah.

206757 210678 Look, I will. You just, uh, lie back.
Come on.

220688 223518 - You Sarah?
- Yeah.

223608 227647 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

227697 230988 She's not my sister. Shelly
just takes care of me.
231028 233368 She's my friend.
233448 237368 Her and Eric.
237408 239668 You lied to her about Eric.

241418 245128 And you're lying to
me about Shelly.
245208 247548 She's gonna die, isn't she?

256599 262309 Now, come on. Come on.
It's okay.
262438 265858 She's gonna be fine.

284749 288799 A building gets torch ed.
All that is left is ashes.

288879 291759 I used to think that was
true about everything...
291839 296259 families, friends, feelings.

296309 300270 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

300309 304690 two people who are meant to be
together, nothing can keep them apart.

342940 346151 What are you, like
the night watchman?

367461 370841 You know, what this
place needs is a...
370921 373261 good natural catastrophe.

373341 377761 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

377801 380811 Mickey, come on, man. You got to
put the mustard underneath first.
380892 383182 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
383271 386312 Hey, hey, let me do it.

386402 390442 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

390482 392942 Come on, man. Don't
cheap out on me.

392992 394952 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.
394992 397412 Hey, all right.
397492 399872 Now we're talking.
399952 404662 Hey, it's the Sarah monster.

404752 408583 - How do you steer that on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

408672 412592 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

412672 414472 - You buying?
- I'm buying.

414552 418223 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?
418302 421513 They make you fart big time.

427852 430562 You know, Lake Erie actually
caught on fire once...

430653 433283 from all the crap
floating around in it.
434442 438203 I wish I could have seen that.
498514 503015 Fire it up! Yeah!

542135 546065 - All right, we busted their machines!
- Shit!

569046 572416 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T-bird, cop car, cop car.

579677 582267 Bad people out on
the street tonight.

588317 590227 - Damn it!
- What was that?

590317 592987 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.
593067 596367 Mickey, call it in for me!

690289 693380 - Eric?
- Department of Housing!
693459 697970 Code violations? Safety hazards?
698049 700260 Place looks fine to me.
700299 703140 Let's redecorate.
705639 709810 "Abash, the devil stood..."
709850 712560 and felt how awful goodness is.

712650 717240 Saw virtue in her shape, how
lovely." It's pornography.
730370 733130 No, no, no, me first.

780931 783841 - Hey, that's good.
- That's good.

787721 791311 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?
791392 793311 Look at that. Look at that.

794652 799112 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

802783 804782 You go over there and
talk to your pals...
804822 807952 You sick fuck.

807992 811712 Are you out of your
motherfucking mind, man?
814963 819342 Look at that!
821553 823592 Pussies drink last, man.

824843 827263 - Fuck you, Tin Tin.
- Hey.
828683 831182 Shit ain't even loaded, man.
831273 833443 This one is.

833522 836443 Which of you Motor
City motherfuckers...
836523 840823 wants to bet me this one isn't?
840903 844783 Hey, fire it up! Fire it up!

844863 847953 - Fire it up!
- Fire it up! - Fire it up!
848033 850833 Fire it up! Fire it up!
850913 854004 Here's your shooters.

854083 856043 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?
- How ya doing?

891455 894964 - I love you.
- Say that again.
900635 904054 Restaurant.

908724 911894 - Wow, you look great.
- Ta-da!

918945 921525 - Come here!
- No, no, no!
1019667 1022218 Couple more rings. That's 24k.

1022297 1026307 24k, huh? It's 18k. It's crap.
It's probably fake.
1026388 1028717 Leather purse. Leather.
1028808 1033307 Geez. Oh, what is this, Tin Tin?
1033398 1037938 A blood stain that's on here?

1038028 1040648 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.
1040738 1043568 Now, you, take it or leave it.
1043658 1046408 Right there for ya.
1046489 1050868 Decisions, decisions.
1052408 1055578 You cheap ass, chrome dome...

1055669 1058669 child molesting,
saprophyte motherfucker.
1058708 1061089 Close the gate when you go out!

1061168 1063839 Oh, I close this up for
you real good, massa.

1066509 1069928 Yeah, sit on it and
twirl, you dirty scum.

1074649 1079108 Lucky I didn't
stab your fat ass.

1184171 1187302 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?
1189892 1194142 Halloween ain't till manana.
1236142 1239563 Fuck, you murderer!

1239643 1242273 I ain't murdered nobody, man! I
don't even fucking know you!

1242353 1246444 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- I want you to tell me a story.

1246533 1249953 A man and a woman in
a loft a year ago.

1249993 1252574 - You're out of your fucking mind...
- Listen!

1252663 1257493 I'm sure you'll remember. You
killed them... on Halloween.

1257583 1262543 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah. Some
dude, some bitch, whatever, man.
1262584 1265044 Her name was Shelly.
1265134 1268133 You cut her. You raped her.

1268214 1274013 Shelly, yeah, yeah. I shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1283234 1288154 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell
you about murder. It's fun!

1288234 1292864 It's easy. You gonna
learn all about it.

1297584 1300125 I'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1300205 1302874 We never miss.

1313475 1315555 - Try again!
- Aaah!
1320645 1325485 Victims. Aren't we all?

1350216 1354555 - Look at this mess! What's the world coming to?
- It's a mess.

1361936 1364696 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.
1369447 1372746 Get out of my way, you worms!
1373866 1375787 Give me some of that over there!

1378037 1381747 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1381797 1386586 Hey, guess what? Arcade
Games fell down, went boom.

1386627 1390467 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1390546 1394766 Gather your soldiers. You're on
for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1394807 1398897 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.
1428927 1432718 You're thinking about the past.
1435018 1437517 Dad gave me this.
1437598 1441768 Fifth birthday.

1441858 1446528 He said childhood's over the
moment you know you're gonna die.
1460418 1462879 Is she asleep?
1469088 1471339 I think we broke her.
1475349 1477469 I love her eyes.

1497080 1500249 Hey, kid, get the
hell outta the road!
1518850 1524400 I told you to stay out of here.

1524440 1528110 So I guess you're not gonna be
home till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1528191 1532241 She's busy. Go play with your
dolls or something, okay?
1532280 1534620 I don't have any dolls.
1534700 1538080 Get some food, huh?

1538121 1541121 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1546841 1550510 - "Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police."
1560521 1563771 Thirty, forty dollars.
1565521 1567981 Who the fuck is this now?
1568021 1572191 Hey! Piss off! We're closed!

1575031 1578872 Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1586462 1590712 Goddamn creatures of the
night, they never learn.

1598392 1602772 "Suddenly I heard a
tapping, as if someone...

1602812 1606772 gently rapping, rapping
at my chamber door."
1608733 1611032 What are you talking about?
1611112 1613822 You heard me rapping, right?

1613902 1618033 You're trespassing, and you
owe me a fucking new door!

1620453 1623412 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1624963 1627292 You're looking for a
coroner, shit-for-brains.
1631553 1636683 Oh, shit. Oh, shit on me!
1636763 1639302 Shit on me. Shit on me!
1647774 1650023 You're not paying attention.

1655194 1660494 I repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1662124 1665584 It was pawned here a year ago by a
customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1668294 1671964 He confided in me before
he ran out of breath.
1677264 1679264 Who's this sack of shit?

1679343 1682304 That's Tin Tin, one of
T-bird's little helpers.

1682393 1685434 I think you can rule
out accidental death.

1685524 1688314 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1688394 1692564 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1692654 1697364 Come on, Albrecht, spare me. You're
a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1697444 1699364 I'm suppose to thank
you for that, right?

1699455 1703204 Word to the wise: Watch
your fucking mouth.
1704415 1706834 What the hell do you call that?
1707875 1710465 I call it blood, detective.

1710544 1714345 I suppose you'll write
it up as graffiti.

1714385 1717175 You can leave my crime
scene now, okay?

1723895 1726815 - Warmer?
- What are you doing?

1726895 1729525 - Don't you know this game?
- What game?

1729565 1732485 Okay, the rings! I'll
tell you about the rings!

1732566 1736945 They're in that metal box!
It's under the shelf there!

1737035 1742535 Take the fucking rings! Choke
on them, you son of a bitch!

1746125 1748705 - Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

1765606 1769816 Oh, it's beautiful.
I don't believe it.

1793717 1796637 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1796717 1799807 - Thank you.
- Take anything!

1799887 1802727 Now you're going to tell
me where to find...

1802808 1805437 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1805518 1807897 The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

1807977 1813067 T- birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

1813147 1816158 - Funboy.
- Oh, baby, oh.

1816237 1819988 - A whole jolly club...
- Please!

1820077 1822827 - With jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

1822907 1825578 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1827247 1830628 Each one of these is a life...
1830708 1833218 a life you helped destroy.
1833298 1835928 I'm begging you. Don't kill me.
1835968 1839678 I'm not gonna kill you.

1839758 1843928 Your job will be to tell the rest of
them that death is coming for them...

1852568 1856778 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1858659 1862748 You walk outta here, they're
gonna erase your sorry ass.

1862828 1866458 You're nothing but street
grease, you motherfucker!
1866538 1868669 Is that gasoline I smell?

1890899 1894360 It's on the house,
kiddo, you know that.
1894439 1896739 One root beer.
1898739 1901490 I can't do anything.

1901580 1906039 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1912840 1917760 Police! Don't move! I
said, "Don't move!"

1917800 1920840 I thought the police
always said, "Freeze!"

1920930 1924850 I am the police and I say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.
1924930 1930101 And I say I'm dead and I move.
1930151 1933480 Not one more step. I'm serious.

1933521 1937900 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1937991 1941120 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1942991 1946161 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1946250 1950250 How about Shelly? Do you
remember Shelly Webster?

1950331 1953001 Shelly Webster's
dead, my friend.

1953041 1957670 I want you to move over to the
curb, nice and easy. Move it!

1957720 1962551 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1962641 1967101 - It's getting too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.

1967181 1969601 Do you know someone
named T-bird?

1969691 1974272 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1974361 1976941 You're the guy that
murdered Tin Tin.

1977031 1980531 - Check it out.
- He was already dead.

1980612 1985952 - He died a year ago. The
moment he touched her.

1986041 1989712 They're all dead. They
just don't know it yet.
1989792 1992212 Get away from there!
1992291 1995422 Cops! Get outta here!
2004262 2008602 Oh, great, great.

2008682 2011272 Guy shows up looking
like a mime from hell...

2011353 2013652 and you lose him right
out in the open.

2013732 2019572 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. I hate that.
2019653 2023572 Little early for Devil's Night.
2025163 2027873 You are very restless.

2027953 2031162 Just wish I was a little
hungry again, that's all.

2031253 2035503 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, I may get it, I know.

2046973 2050023 There are energies
aligning against you.
2050104 2052564 Seeing is believing, isn't it?

2071704 2075674 Gideon's pawnshop just burned
down to the foundation.

2075754 2078964 Nobody cleared this
little event with me.

2079044 2080804 I didn't have nothing
to do with that.

2080884 2083554 You must be awfully
disappointed.

2083634 2086974 I got trouble. One of my
crew got himself perished.

2087014 2089314 - Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

2089394 2093984 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

2094025 2096605 Gentlemen, by all means, I
think we ought to have...

2096694 2099864 an introspective moment of
silence for poor, old Tin Tin.

2102535 2105114 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2105205 2107994 - Whatever you say, I can do.
- Good.
2108035 2110874 That's very reassuring.

2110915 2114965 I still ain't heard why
Gideon's burned down.

2115045 2119505 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2119595 2121425 Call it my need to know.
2155046 2157625 Let go, you creep!

2162806 2166097 You didn't even slow
down, you dickhead!
2167516 2169896 He couldn't have stopped.

2169977 2174266 He was a buttface. I
could have made it.

2174356 2177397 What are you supposed to
be, a clown or something?

2181527 2186287 It's more like surfing than skating. I
wish the rain would stop, just once.

2187447 2190956 - It can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2207887 2212477 Don't thank me. Are we
fighting the good fight?

2212558 2216898 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.
2216978 2220397 Annie... look at that.

2220488 2224697 "We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments..."
2224778 2226828 What is this, a petition?

2226908 2229788 Big "kick me" sign for a very nice
girl who found herself a cause.

2229868 2233958 - The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction in that neighborhood?

2234038 2239918 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2240008 2243548 The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2243639 2247638 - I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2254649 2258398 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2260649 2265409 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.
2265448 2267949 Ah, I owe you one!

2297729 2301609 Tomorrow night we
can get high...

2301690 2305359 and watch this whole fucking
city burn from that window.

2330261 2332890 - There's a big fucking bird over there.
- * No more **
2339060 2341690 Come here, bird.
2341781 2343861 Hey, bird. Hey, bird.
2343940 2346280 Bird. B-B-Birdie.
2346321 2348951 Here, birdie, birdie.

2348990 2351991 Come here, birdie,
birdie, birdie.
2354621 2357831 Birdie? Hey, birdie?
2362841 2364801 What the fuck?

2371181 2375731 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!
2378021 2380901 Don't sweat it.

2382611 2385652 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2393582 2398422 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2400422 2405342 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2405422 2408932 You need professional help.
2413393 2416023 He shoots! He scores!

2426153 2429863 - Jesus Christ!
- Jesus Christ?
2429952 2432663 Stop me if you heard this one.
2432743 2435662 Jesus Christ walks into a hotel.

2441083 2443843 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2443923 2447463 Don't you ever fucking die?

2447553 2449803 "Can you put me up
for the night?"

2455314 2459894 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it... Fuck, does it hurt?

2462103 2466194 Look what you've
done to my sheets.
2490424 2492434 I've got a gun in my pocket.

2495475 2498185 You're happy to see
me, aren't you?
2515955 2519835 Stay away! Stay away from me!

2531556 2536055 Mother is the name for God on the
lips and hearts of all children.

2536146 2540895 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2551326 2556126 Your daughter is out there on
the streets waiting for you.

2585897 2589576 If I wanted ice, I would
have asked for ice!
2589657 2591907 Now fill it up!
2592997 2596367 Fill it up yourself, macho man.
2596456 2599127 I really need this.

2607717 2611677 You burn yourself
playing with matches?

2611717 2614307 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2614387 2616847 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2616938 2619858 This is a first. Do I
bow or do I curtsy?

2619938 2622727 Get my friend here
a glass of blood.
2626317 2629238 Hey, good night, Darla.
2631658 2635368 You stay put right there.
2643418 2646878 Get away, steamhead.

2678039 2683789 As you can see, I'm on the
corner of 27th and Washington...

2683839 2686589 - the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2686669 2689629 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2689719 2692679 across the street from me was
totally demolished by fire.

2692720 2694890 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2694969 2697099 but lost the lives of
two fire fighters.

2697179 2701940 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police...
2705020 2708530 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.
2712530 2714700 Good likeness.

2714780 2718500 I saw your body, man. You died.
You got buried.
2718580 2720830 You still have your hat on.
2724750 2726840 I gotta sit down.
2736680 2740981 are you some kind of... ghost?

2750610 2755161 I don't know what I am. I need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2757161 2761251 You took a six-story swan
dive out of a window.
2761331 2764421 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2764502 2769091 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.
2769171 2771801 Come on. Read the file.

2771881 2776221 Shelly Webster held on for
30 hours in intensive care.

2776301 2779521 Her body finally
just gave it up.

2779562 2783442 I saw it. I couldn't
do jack for her.

2793322 2795241 - Hey.
- Don't touch me!
2807962 2811262 I saw her through your eyes.

2811342 2813423 You stayed with her
the whole time.

2813512 2818972 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2819052 2823812 I was hoping she'd come
out of it, you know.

2823853 2826812 Give me something I
could work with.

2831653 2834153 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2834243 2837573 You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

2837663 2841123 would talk after what
happened to you?
2841203 2844413 I kept asking questions and...

2844503 2847173 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.
2851173 2853133 This your wife?

2853213 2857684 Yeah, we, uh... Well, not
anymore, we're getting a divorce.

2862564 2866564 Little things used to
mean so much to Shelly.

2866644 2870154 I used to think they
were kind of trivial.
2870234 2873234 Believe me, nothing is trivial.

2882874 2887334 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2892004 2895215 You going to vanish
into thin air again?

2898845 2901555 I thought I'd use
your front door.

2904605 2910445 Look, man, I'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

2921535 2925045 I got stabbed! I shot
the son of a bitch!

2925126 2928255 I watched the bullet
hole close by itself.

2928335 2931385 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2931465 2934716 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.
2934755 2937306 I saw him too. He had a guitar.

2937385 2941805 He winked at me before he jumped out a
fourth-floor window like he had wings.
2941896 2946896 He winked at ya? Musicians.

2946976 2949445 - What else did you see?
- So far I haven't heard...

2949526 2952026 shit about what you're going
to do about all this crap!

2952105 2957616 What do I get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.
2957695 2960456 You ain't lost everything.

2960536 2965626 Yeah, and maybe you're not such
a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!
2965706 2969296 Fair enough. Catch.

2972927 2975346 Say hello to the last fellow who
wouldn't cooperate with me.

2975426 2977426 What're you telling me,
this thing is real?

2977467 2981136 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2981227 2985186 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2985266 2989397 You're directly out of your fucking mind!
You know that!

2992196 2997367 Eyes see. It's one of the most important
things I learned from my sister.

2997447 3000697 Sister? She's supposed
to be your sister?

3000744 3004074 My father's daughter.
That's right.

3004075 3007085 What's the matter, you
don't see the resemblance?

3007164 3009414 Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

3009504 3013004 With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

3013135 3016594 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

3016675 3020054 He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.
3020134 3022394 Whatever the fuck that means.

3022435 3026225 Draven. He said his
name was Eric Draven.
3027315 3029395 Want to relax that thing now?

3029435 3034114 This bird man, he just
happened to let you live, huh?

3034195 3038575 You sure you ain't making all this
up just to save your own ass?
3038615 3041325 I ain't making all this up.

3041405 3045915 I ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

3054505 3059515 A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

3069776 3072776 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

3082076 3084366 Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

3087126 3092006 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.

3092086 3096006 I'll have the
janitor come on up.
3159918 3162288 You lost or hungry?

3183109 3185829 I don't know how many times I gotta
tell you. We're in this together!
3185898 3188819 One part falls, it all falls!

3188899 3192368 - You know how long it took us to put this together?
